diff_hunk:
@@ -38,8 +38,8 @@
 
 FLAGS = None
 
-
 def main(unused_argv=None):
+  FLAGS = parse_argument()
body:
Unfortunately this won't work, as `app.run()` consumes all the flags in `sys.argv`, so none of them will get to `parse_argument()` by the time it is called. Clearly tensorboard needs some integration tests. Because of some internal considerations we're going to have to revert back to using `tf.app.flags` until we get a more permanent solution (which hopefully moves argparsing out of `tf.app.run()`) 

Thanks for your contribution and sorry for our speed on this issue =(.

body_text:
Unfortunately this won't work, as app.run() consumes all the flags in sys.argv, so none of them will get to parse_argument() by the time it is called. Clearly tensorboard needs some integration tests. Because of some internal considerations we're going to have to revert back to using tf.app.flags until we get a more permanent solution (which hopefully moves argparsing out of tf.app.run())
Thanks for your contribution and sorry for our speed on this issue =(.
